definitions.definition: A deep-bowled spoonlike utensil with a long, usually curved, handle .
A container used in a foundry to transport and pour out molten metal .
The float of a mill wheel ; a ladle board .
An instrument for drawing the charge of a cannon .
A ring , with a handle or handles fitted to it, for carrying shot .

main_definition: A deep-bowled spoonlike utensil with a long, usually curved, handle .
secondary_definitions: ( metallurgy ) A container used in a foundry to transport and pour out molten metal .
The float of a mill wheel ; a ladle board .
An instrument for drawing the charge of a cannon .
A ring , with a handle or handles fitted to it, for carrying shot .
